The aim study analyze diabetes distress ( diabetes-related parenting burden fear hypoglycemia ) , parental psychological well-being ( anxiety , satisfaction life , positive negative affect adult attachment relationship pattern ) , family hardiness characteristic child type 1 diabetes sample mother father child adolescent type 1 diabetes age 18 year . In study hypothesize : 1. great parental fear hypoglycemia diabetes-related burden associate low family hardiness bad psychological well-being parent higher HbA1c level child adolescent type 1 diabetes ; 2. mother report great fear hypoglycemia , diabetes-related burden lower psychological well-being comparing father . 3. parent child adolescent type 1diabetes report great anxiety , low psychological well-being family hardiness compare parent child without diabetes . Standardized validate questionnaire use determine : parental fear hypoglycemia , diabetes-related burden , parent level anxiety , psychological well-being , adult attachment relationship pattern family hardiness . The investigator also measure parent daily involvement child 's diabetes management , frequency blood glucose monitor parent general satisfaction glycemic control . Objective measure child 's HbA1c level experience severe hypoglycemia episode also obtain . These measure correlate research variable .
